thread.title: Sullia: Local resident Ajitesh P S Permuka appointed as Lieutenant in Indian Army - Daijiworld.com
thread.title_full: Sullia: Local resident Ajitesh P S Permuka appointed as Lieutenant in Indian Army - Daijiworld.com

title: Sullia: Local resident Ajitesh P S Permuka appointed as Lieutenant in Indian Army - Daijiworld.com
text: Daijiworld Media Network – Sullia (MS) Sullia, Mar 10: Ajitesh P S Permuka, a resident of Noochila in Subramanya village, has been appointed as a Lieutenant in the Indian Army. Ajitesh completed his primary and high school education at Kumaraswamy Vidyalaya, followed by PUC at Vivekananda College in Puttur. He obtained his BSc degree from a college in Ponnampet and pursued his second-year MSc at the Forest Research Institute in Dehradun. In 2023, Ajitesh successfully cleared the Army recruitment examination and underwent training at the Indian Army Officers’ Training Institute in Chennai. Ajitesh is the son of Vidyaratna, the head teacher of Kumaraswamy Educational Institute, and Srikrishna Sharma P, a retired head teacher of Bilinele Sri Gopalakrishna High School. Oh Great! Congratulations! God Bless! Jai Hind Disclaimer: Please write your correct name and email address.
